content: this cute tote bag is perfect for everyday use it has an adorable look about it it can be used as a market bag or hobby bag it is very versatile use it as a handbag or shoulder bag it is an easy spacious modern bag it goes well with all outfits use it as a beach bag or market tote bag in summers this is pattern for women this beautiful bag is easy and works up fast it is made in rounds no sewing needed at all it is called the japanese knot bag because of the way it closed on top with the handles we will use an easy beginner lacy stitch i have enjoyed making this bag very much and i know you will too skill beginner friendly yarn any medium weight or weight 4 yarn of your choice can be used yarn used by me red heart super saver yardage 333 m/ 364 yards in 198 g of yarn each skein has 198 g material 100% acrylic shade buff/ beige e300 0334 amount needed 137 g or 252 yards crochet hook 5 mm or h size hook notions stitch markers tapestry needle measuring tape scissors there is a youtube tutorial that explains in detail and i have linked it at the end of this pattern the pattern is written in us crochet terms in english this is a 7 page pdf pattern a print friendly version is available it has written instructions for the crochet pattern and detailed pattern row by row notes with pictures it does not include finished product it can be made in any similar yarn suitable for
